name: AudioContext.baseLatency
description: The baseLatency read-only property of the AudioContext interface returns a double that represents the number of seconds of processing latency incurred by the AudioContext passing an audio buffer from the AudioDestinationNode — i.e. the end of the audio graph — into the host system's audio subsystem ready for playing.

refs.name: Web Audio API
refs.description: The definition of 'baseLatency' in Web Audio API.
